Note: Signed "S. Pryse." Information pencilled in on bottom right of poster and typed title appears glued onto bottom.  Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Cavalry troopers, mounted and dismounted, in a grove of trees, with plowed fields and a village on a hill in the background. This seems to be the first Battle of the Aisne, 1914.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
